events.message: I recently bought a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit me correctly and I am not satisfied with the size.
The issue has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's reason related to dissatisfaction and size.
Assigning this refund request case to the customer support representative specialized in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket purchase. Iâ€™m here to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
The order number is 123456789. The jacket is in perfect condition and still has the tags attached. I have not worn it yet.
Thank you for the information. You are eligible for a full refund. Please use the prepaid return label we emailed you to send the jacket back to us.
Thanks for the quick response and for sending the return label. I will ship the jacket back today.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund successfully and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Yes, I received the refund today. Everything was handled efficiently. Thank you very much for your help!
We are glad your issue was resolved. This case will now be closed, and please feel free to contact us again if needed.
